resume_snippet: SUMMARY: Quality professional with 20+ years’ experience with focus on electronic document management systems. Recognized as successfully managing and leading teams in migration and implementing document management systems that simplified the IT landscape and streamlined global business processes that created a single source of truth for controlled documents. CORE COMPETENCIES: Global Business Process Owner Strategy and Planning (IT projects/business needs) Decision Making Self-Motivated Design
